The Quranic researcher is a deterrent to those who disbelieved from the sex of the human being with the grace of God, the Almighty, with his tyrants, and if he did not mention the words of the words to him; That is because the opening of the surah to this cut is indicated by the greatness And with the tyrants, as well as the reason for the Almighty saying: The human being will be overwhelmed by any: the limit will be overlooked in disobedience and follow the passion of the soul, and he will be blessed.Al -Kalbi said: That is, to be a house to a house in the dress and food and others, and not to do so, and some of them were estimated after the saying of God: Glorify, he overwhelmed and disbelieved.It was said: Every sense is a right to the same as what is directed to the deterrence and the dazzling, so it is said that the human being said: The human being, etc.It was said: He descended in my father Jahl after a time from the righteous verses of the verses, which is the back, and with his descent in that curse that is intended for the human being.
